Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供将控件组合在一起的功能。

span.span: Provides the capability to group controls together.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 窗体表示 ASP.NET 移动 Web 页中的控件的最外面的分组。A form represents the outermost grouping of controls within an ASP.NET mobile Web page. 单个移动 Web 页面可以包含多个窗体最外层级别。An individual mobile Web page can contain multiple forms at the outermost level. 不能嵌套窗体;使用控制如果你想要将嵌套的容器。Forms cannot be nested; use controls if you want to nest containers. 有关详细信息，请参阅[窗体控件简介](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/dxzx3ss0(v=vs.85))。For more information, see [Introduction to the Form Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/dxzx3ss0(v=vs.85)). 若要显示特定窗体，请设置属性上当前分页到所需表单，或者设置属性中的到所需的窗体控件。To display a specific form, either set the property on the current page to the desired form, or set the property in a control to the desired form. 可以在的文本内容中包含以及其伴随的标记的文字文本控件。You can include literal text along with its accompanying markup tags in the text contents of the control. 使用模板时，务必要记住控件创建模板中的实例窗体的方法。When using templates, it is important to remember that the control creates instances of templates in the method for the form. 窗体的方法之前调用`Page_Load`和`Page_Init`。The method for the form is called before `Page_Load` and `Page_Init`. 此外，该页的构造函数执行得太早中设置模板方法因为尚未创建窗体。Also, the page constructor executes too early to set templates in the method because the form is not yet created. 若要更正此问题，挂钩窗体的自己方法，并创建那里的模板一个实例。To correct this, hook the form's own method, and create an instance of the template there. 有关详细信息，请参阅[实现模板化呈现](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b86d9d1d-ab18-4cad-a825-092826bb3922)。For more information, see [Implementing Templated Rendering](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b86d9d1d-ab18-4cad-a825-092826bb3922). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建包含两个窗体以及两个窗体之间的链接的网页。The following code example shows how to create a page with two forms along with links between the two forms. 一种形式有一个复选框列表。One form has a check box list. 当选择项并**提交**单击按钮时，窗体显示所的选项及其值的列表。When items are selected and the **Submit** button is clicked, the form presents a list of the selected items and their values. 请注意，事件方法准备显示相应窗体Notice that the event methods prepare the respective forms for display > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileFormSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileFormSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

The URL to which the form is submitted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为空字符串 ("")，导致回发到包含当前窗体的页。The default value, an empty string (""), causes postbacks to the page containing the current form. 您可以重写要提交到不同的 URL 窗体的默认值。You can override the default value to submit the form to a different URL. > [!NOTE] > 如果继承属性，控件将表单内容发布到继承的 URL。If the property is inherited, the control posts form contents to the inherited URL.

span.span: Introduction to the Form Control

summary.span: 当激活窗体时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a form becomes active.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生在下列情况下：The event occurs under the following circumstances: - 当第一次请求页面时，激活第一个窗体。When a page is first requested, the first form is activated. - 当以编程方式设置页的属性。When the property of the page is set programmatically. - 当用户导航到窗体通过其目标是一种形式的控制。When the user navigates to a form through a control whose target is a form. 此事件的事件链中的位置，使绑定到数据源的子控件或设置可以由所有子控件继承的窗体属性非常重要。This event's position in the event chain makes it very important for binding child controls to data sources or for setting a form property that can be inherited by all child controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置`OnActivate`中的属性元素以指向时，会执行一个方法事件发生。The following code example shows how to set the `OnActivate` attribute in the element to point to a method that executes when the event occurs. `Form2_Activate`方法准备要显示的第二种形式。The `Form2_Activate` method prepares the second form for display. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例概述。This example is part of a larger example for the overview. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-csharp[MobileFormSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[MobileFormSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileFormSample#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default2.aspx#8)]

summary.span: 获取或设置可以分页的窗体上的控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the control on the form that can be paginated.

summary.span: 默认值为 （在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: The default is ( in Visual Basic).

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

value.span: 可以分页的窗体上的控件。

span.span: The control on the form that can be paginated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于允许要对其内容在移动设备和提供下一步和上一个视图之间的导航上的多个视图之间进行分页的窗体上的单个控件。The property is used to allow a single control on a form to paginate its contents across several views on mobile devices and providing next and previous navigation between views. 控件可以分页其内容，即使一个，其中包含控件具有其属性设置为`false`。A control can paginate its contents even if a containing control has its property set to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性的类，以指定哪个控件进行分页。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property of the class to specify which control to paginate. 该示例使用两个窗体创建一个页面。The example creates a page with two forms. 一个窗体具有一个非常长字符串，在某些设备上必须对其进行分页，以提供用户访问权限的整个文本。One form has a very long string that on some devices must be paginated to give the user access to the entire text. 若要查看操作中的分页方式，您必须处理分页的设备上查看该示例。In order to see the pagination in action, you must view the example on a device that handles pagination. 在中[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，可以使用一个设备仿真程序附带**设备仿真器管理器**上**工具**菜单。In [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you can use one of the device emulators available with the **Device Emulator Manager** on the **Tools** menu. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileFormSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default2.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileFormSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default2.aspx#4)]

Public Overrides Sub CreateDefaultTemplatedUI (doDataBind As Boolean)

param.name: doDataBind
param.span: 如果实例化模板必须绑定到可用数据（通常在第一次请求时发生这种情况），则设置为 true。

span.span: Set to true if the instantiated templates must bind to available data (which usually happens on the first request).

param.span: 如果模板不能绑定到数据，而要依靠视图状态填充这些模板（通常在后续回发时发生这种情况），则设置为 false。

span.span: Set to false if the templates must not bind to data, and instead rely on view state to fill them in (which usually happens on subsequent postbacks).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 窗体变为非活动状态在下列情况下：A form becomes inactive under the following circumstances: - 当页的属性以编程方式设置为另一种形式。When the property of the page is programmatically set to another form. - 当用户导航到窗体通过其目标是一种形式的控制。When the user navigates to a form through a control whose target is a form. 如果任一这些操作发生时，将永远不会收到活动窗体事件。If neither of these actions occurs, the active form will never receive a event. 此事件的事件链中的位置，使得在重置子控件、 数据集或全局变量非常重要。This event's position in the event chain makes it very important in resetting the child controls, data set, or global variables. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何捕获事件以清除。The following code example demonstrates how to trap the event to clear the . 此示例摘自一个更大的示例概述。This example is part of a larger example for the overview. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.IList GetLinkedForms(int32 optimumPageWeight) cil managed
Public Function GetLinkedForms (optimumPageWeight As Integer) As IList

param.name: optimumPageWeight
param.span: 不能超过得到的链接窗体的目标设备的总权重（在分页中使用）。

span.span: The total weight for the target device of the resulting linked forms must not exceed (used in pagination).

param.span: 如果其值为 -1，则将链接窗体添加到列表时将不考虑总权重。

span.span: If its value is -1, the total weight will not be considered when linked forms are added to the list.

summary.span: 返回链接到当前窗体的一组窗体。

span.span: Returns a set of forms that are linked to the current form.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

returns.span: 链接到当前窗体的窗体集。

span.span: A set of forms that are linked to the current form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当窗体包含激活另一种形式，无需与服务器交互的导航元素时，它被视为可链接窗体。When a form contains navigation elements that activate another form without interacting with the server, it is considered to be a linked form. 有几个因素涉及窗体，才能被视为链接。There are several factors involved for a form to be considered linked. 例如，如果满足以下三个条件，窗体 B 被视为可链接到窗体： 形式之一For example, if the following three stipulations are met, Form B is considered to be one of the forms linked to Form A: - 窗体包含具有其目标为 B 窗体控件Form A contains a control with its destination as Form B. - 窗体的不包含事件处理程序。Form A does not contain an event handler. - 窗体 B 没有事件处理程序。Form B has no event handler. 两者的区别是不需要服务器交互的传输控件之间的所有窗体的组。The distinction is the set of all forms that do not require server interactions to transfer control between.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个`get`请求是它可以发送的数据量的限制。A `get` request is limited in the amount of data it can post. 某些类型的回发使用时可能会失败`get`请求。Some types of postbacks might fail when using a `get` request. 利用`get`请求是所有参数都指定为可以缓存的 URL，以及其 URL 的一部分，或将其保存。The advantage of a `get` request is that all the parameters are specified as part of the URL, and the URL can be cached or saved. 元素`post`内包含请求。The elements of a `post` request are contained within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当通过此方法通知，服务器控件必须执行创建和设置实例所需的任何初始化步骤。When notified by this method, server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 在服务器控件的生命周期的此阶段，控件的视图状态尚未填充。In this stage of the server control's lifecycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated. 此外，不能访问其他服务器控件时调用此方法是，无论是子级或到此控件的父级。Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called either, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 其他服务器控件不能确定要创建并可供访问。Other server controls are not certain to be created and ready for access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件公开属性和属性，用于提供有关如何对当前窗体进行分页的信息。The control exposes the property and the property, which provide information about how the current form is paginated. 属性还可帮助提供到其他页面的导航功能。The property also helps provide navigation capability to another page. 例如时呈现更丰富的设备上，搜索结果窗体可能包含允许用户浏览页结果数决定，而不是链接导航到的特定于设备的 UI 元素。For example, when rendering on a richer device, a search results form might include device-specific UI elements that allow the user to browse to a page of results by number rather than by link navigation. > [!NOTE] > 此值是下列时间之后可用事件已发生。This value is available after the event has occurred. 若要获取属性，可以处理窗体的事件。To get the property, you can handle the event of the form. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property of the control. 此代码示例摘自一个更大示例的属性。This code example is part of a larger example for the property. [!code-csharp[MobileFormSample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default2.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[MobileFormSample#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default2.aspx#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果以编程方式设置此属性，它不会为每个请求中保持。If this property is set programmatically, it is not persisted for each request. 如果以声明方式设置该属性，属性被保留的每个请求。If the property is set declaratively, the property is persisted for each request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自一个更大的示例属性。This code example is from a larger example for the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在呈现每个请求之前，窗体进行分页。A form is paginated prior to rendering each request. 分页已完成之后,事件发生。After pagination is complete, the event occurs. 此事件发生后，窗体的属性包含的窗体页的实际数目。After this event occurs, the property of the form contains the actual number of pages for the form. ## Examples 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅示例属性。For a complete code example, see the example for the property.

span.span: Gets or sets the title of the specified form.

summary.span: 默认值为空 。

span.span: The default value is an empty .

value.span: 在支持标题与页内容分离的设备上，可以将标题呈现为窗体的一部分（例如，在浏览器的标题栏中使用 HTML 的标题标记）。

span.span: The title can be rendered as part of the form, on devices that support a title separate from page content (for example, on the title bar of a browser using the title tag in HTML).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于支持独立于页面内容的标题的设备，可以呈现为窗体部分的标题。For devices that support a title separate from the page content, you can render the title as part of the form.
